mapper.select: select m.id as id,m.created_at as createdAt,m.created_by as createdBy, m.updated_at as updatedAt,m.updated_by as updatedBy,m.comment as comment,m.image_urls as imageUrls, ifnull(m.like_num,0) as likeNum,m.name as name,m.email as email, u.avatar as avatar from t_moment_comment m left join t_user u on m.created_by = u.id where m.is_delete = 0 and u.is_delete = 0

select m.id as id,m.created_at as createdAt,m.created_by as createdBy, m.updated_at as updatedAt,m.updated_by as updatedBy,m.comment as comment,m.image_urls as imageUrls, ifnull(m.like_num,0) as likeNum,m.name as name,m.email as email, u.avatar as avatar from t_moment_comment m left join t_user u on m.created_by = u.id where m.is_delete = 0 and u.is_delete = 0 and m.id = #{id}

select m.id as id,m.created_at as createdAt,m.created_by as createdBy, m.updated_at as updatedAt,m.updated_by as updatedBy,m.comment as comment,m.image_urls as imageUrls, ifnull(m.like_num,0) as likeNum,m.name as name,m.email as email, u.avatar as avatar from t_moment_comment m left join t_user u on m.created_by = u.id where m.is_delete = 0 and u.is_delete = 0 and m.moment_id = #{momentId}
